text: Paul Coppens is a Belgian television writer and sound engineer. Mainly a writer for Belgian television, Coppens is probably best known for his writing of Alle maten since 1998 with Frans Ceusters. ==External links== * ==References== Category:Flemish television writers Category:Male television writers Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Belgian male writers
title: Paul Coppens
